name: Litnerd
headline: Reading + Writing Club App for Kids
description:
Litnerd is a kids reading + writing club app that grew by 14x this past school year. Think of us as a modern-day Scholastic, with a heavy IP play. We create original IP with our community + partner brands -> turn them into books, media and learning curriculum, layered with an AI personalized tutor to help kids learn to read and write in a personalized and engaging way.

Our product format is a Social and Gamified - with a live weekly community meetup and monthly e-tournaments. 

- And it works! Litnerd 4x improved the pass rate of students on their annual state Reading (ELA) exam.
- STICKY: Kids spend 10-20 minutes on the Litnerd app OUTSIDE of classroom time.
- KID AUTHORS: Kids are the authors of the books and Litnerd AI helps illustrate + publish the book.
- Built on the Science of Reading
- Original IP: all books, media and courseware is original content created and published by Litnerd.

founders.name: Anisa Mirza, Founder/CEO
founders.description:
CEO & Founder at Litnerd. Building the next gen Scholastic (reading + writing club app for kids, where the books are written by kid authors!)

- Anisa Mirza is a two-time Y Combinator and venture-backed founder. 
- She is also a Forbes 30 Under 30 honoree. 
- As an immigrant to America, running a women and minority owned business, Anisa takes special pride in seeing the impact Litnerd has in producing superior learning outcomes for kids.
- Bootstrapped first startup from 0 to 2Mill ARR (exited)

## Litnerd is a proud NYC Department of Education vendor. Over 14,000 students have experienced Litnerd in their classroom.
## Turning Reading into a Game
Litnerd hosts thrilling reading tournaments designed for [schools](https://litnerd.com/<https:/www.litnerd.com/schools-tournament>) and [individual kids](https://litnerd.com/<https:/www.litnerd.com/families-tournament>) all year round. Kids immerse themselves in a world where books come to life, as they compete for Litcoin. ​
​
Infusing gaming elements into reading ignites the motivation and inspiration within each child to read voraciously.
![Litcoin, gamification for learning to motivate kids to read](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/096853_9583f962224c41b0aac2d3f54ec62f14~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_219,h_183,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/096853_9583f962224c41b0aac2d3f54ec62f14~mv2.png)
## Bringing books to life
Experience the vibrant world of Litnerd with movie adaptations and Litnerd LIVE, where books come alive in an interactive format. Each week at Litnerd LIVE, a talented actor guides the conversation and facilitates special activities that places kids in the creative process, fostering a tight-knit community of young readers.
92% 
of kids said Litnerd made reading fun.
## Science of Reading Curriculum
Litnerd's curriculum is built on the Science of Reading and is aligned to Common Core Standards. It is designed to improve comprehension, vocabulary, phonics, phonemic awareness, and fluency. 
​
Litnerd Reading Club helped kids grow by 40% (on average) on comprehension, vocabulary, and phonics. 
[Learn More](https://litnerd.com/<https:/www.litnerd.com/curriculum>)
![5 Pillars of Literacy, Science of reading curriculum, science of reading app](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/096853_f1f823472b114317b3c27bc3bb3ca932~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_51,h_42,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/5%20Pillars.png)
![family portal for reading to help kids learn to read at home](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/096853_eb110db7eb274a4aa855d0937a270bd1~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_50,h_42,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/096853_eb110db7eb274a4aa855d0937a270bd1~mv2.png)
## Track Progress
With the Litnerd app, administrators, teachers, and families can track and measure student progress with actionable data.
[Learn More about Family Portals](https://litnerd.com/<https:/www.litnerd.com/copy-of-home>)

generated_description:
**Litnerd: Sparking Creativity and Learning in Young Minds**

Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's S21 batch, Litnerd is an innovative educational platform based in New York that’s revolutionizing the way kids engage with reading and writing. With the mission of being a modern-day Scholastic, Litnerd has grown impressively—by 14x over the last school year. Yet what distinguishes them is not just their growth; it's their approach that combines literacy with creativity, technology, and fun.

**Unique Approach to Learning:**
Litnerd creates original intellectual property (IP) alongside its community and partner brands. From this collaboration, they develop books, media, and learning curriculums, all enhanced by an AI-driven personalized tutor designed to make reading and writing not just educational but engaging.

**How It Works:**
The Litnerd app is a gamified, social platform where kids actively participate in the reading process. The app incorporates live weekly community meetups and monthly e-tournaments, turning learning into a dynamic experience. Kids aren't just passive consumers; they become "Kid Authors," co-creating and publishing their books with the help of Litnerd’s AI.

**Proven Impact:**
The results have been significant—students using Litnerd showed a fourfold increase in the pass rate on annual state Reading (ELA) exams. On average, kids engage with the app for 10-20 minutes outside of classroom time, underscoring its stickiness. The curriculum is firmly grounded in the Science of Reading, aligned with Common Core Standards, and aims to advance key skills like comprehension, vocabulary, phonics, and fluency.

**Community and Connectivity:**
Litnerd actively connects with schools and families, offering programs like the Young Authors Program that includes live assemblies, guided writing sessions, and real publishing opportunities for students. Over 14,000 students have already benefited from Litnerd in their classrooms, and the feedback is overwhelmingly positive—92% of kids reported that Litnerd made reading fun.

**A Bright Future:**
With a compact team of six, Litnerd is not just building an app; it's cultivating a community of young readers and writers. The blend of education and entertainment, backed by a solid foundation of research-based practices, showcases Litnerd's commitment to transforming literacy education. 

If you're interested in leveling up your child's reading experience, check out their offerings at [Litnerd.com](https://litnerd.com).

**Contact Information:**
- **Phone**: (929) 203 - 4608
- **Email**: contact@litnerd.com

Whether you're a parent looking to enrich your child's education or an educator seeking innovative tools for your classroom, Litnerd is paving the way for the future of learning.
